[![Stable version](http://img.shields.io/packagist/v/nextras/orm.svg)](https://packagist.org/packages/nextras/orm)


**NOT PRODUCTION READY**

### HowTo test it

Add to your composer.json:

```
"require": {
	"nette/database": "~2.3@dev",
	"nextras/orm": "@dev"
}
```
